name: Freyr
skill: Increases DMG dealt by all allies by 36/43% for a limited time.
ability: Sharply (25%) increases the number of soulstones received from battle.
Restores HP to Divina team members at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: A spirit worshipped as a fertility god. Celebrating Thanksgiving at the Bureau of the Occult was originally his idea. This year's celebration, though with its fair share of hitches, came to a happy end with the formation of many new bonds of friendship. He managed to convey his feelings to others, and they to him. In the future he hopes that he and the many people he is proud to call friends will not only rely on each other, but be happy to take on each others' troubles.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Thanksgiving Day Beatdown" Event: Get a First Half or Second Half Ranking of 2500 and above.
◦ "Thanksgiving Day Beatdown" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 4000 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Moderately increases the drop rate of Seed of Thanks during the "Thanksgiving Day Beatdown" event.

skill: "My way of fighting gives strength to my allies!"
summon: "I will continue to share my feelings...including with you, of course."
limit_break: "I never thought I would receive something in return... Thank goodness I came with you."
